name: B. Little Dima and Equation
statement:
Little Dima misbehaved during a math lesson a lot and the nasty teacher
Mr. Pickles gave him the following problem as a punishment. Find all
integer solutions of the equation: where , , are some predetermined
constant values and function determines the sum of all digits in the
decimal representation of number .The teacher gives this problem to Dima

Dima got sick of getting bad marks and he asks you to help him solve
